page.title: 04HOUSING IN EGERTON
page.content: Whilst there are isolated farm houses, the main residential area is Egerton. Until 20 years ago the village consisted of stone, mill workers cottages built on either side of the Bolton-Blackburn road, with mill owners halls behind.The latter have disappeared giving way to numerous estates of brick housing. The housing is entirely privately owned, and cost between Â£30,000 and Â£80,000.Villagers are totally opposed to further development. 40% of the houses are detached, 40% are semi-detached, with 20%, principally older properties being terraced.
